name: StickySpace20XX
description:
Keep your faceship out of the black holes to avoid taking damage! Shoot sticky stuff at your opponents to make them take up more space! The more stuff that's stuck to you, the harder it is to avoid black holes!

2-4 players!

Art by Lexie Mason-Davis (http://lexiecon.itch.io/)

Music by Burl Tonga (https://soundcloud.com/burl-tonga)

Expanded version of game made for Ludum Dare 32: "An Unusual Weapon"

Currently requires at least two players, and a controller for each of them. Keyboard/mouse controls coming in the future. Xbox controllers or PS4 controllers with InputMapper (https://inputmapper.com/) work great!

This is an alpha build. More features and improved gameplay coming in the future!
